pages.text: With this widget you can make a $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$ emit a $(#f00)redstone signal/$. You can specify the sides it emits from by $(thing)right-clicking/$ the widget and configuring in the setup GUI. The redstone signal level to emit is specified by attaching a $(l:programming/text)Text/$ widget with a number in it (from 0 - 15).
